attributes.action: Get Child Soldiers On The National Citizenship Curriculum for Years 7 To 9
attributes.additional_details: The aim of the e-petition is that we would like to get Child Soldiers on the Citizenship Curriculum for year 7 up to year 9 students. We hope we can get as many people to sign this e- petition so that we can raise awareness and hopefully have Child Soldiers on the new 2014 curriculum.
